Bread Finance | New York, NY | Software Engineering | Fulltime

Bread Finance is a series A technology startup working on the consumer finance space. We have a microservices infrastructure using Go in the backend and React in the front-end. I am currently an engineer here and I'm working alongside some of the smartest engineers I've ever met. If you are interested please send me an email to david [a][t] breadfinance.com and I can tell you more about the role and how to apply :)
